bibl.title: Edification in the Early Egyptian Church. Evidence from a Bishop's Dossier.
bibl.note: The ""dossier"" or ""archive"" of the bishop Sotas [5 Greek papyri, late third or early fourth century].

bibl.title: Coptic Culture. Past, Present and Future.

bibl.seg: Alanna Nobbs, Edification in the Early Egyptian Church. Evidence from a Bishop's Dossier.
Mariam F. Ayad (ed.), Coptic Culture. Past, Present and Future (Stevenage, 2012) pp. 109-113.
The ""dossier"" or ""archive"" of the bishop Sotas [5 Greek papyri, late third or early fourth century].
